div.title: Welcome
div.pre:
Before you can start editing your new giewiki, you need to <> and set various data for the root page. This is done via the ''page properties'' dialog which looks a lot like this:
<> The data is: * ''Title & Subtitle''
What is displayed at the top of the page and in the SiteMap, etc. * ''Owner''
Who controls the properties of this page. This would be your PenName, which initially is the same as your login name, but you can change it via the UserProfile. * ''Groups''
You may define a group (or multiple groups) of people that should have elevated access to the page. * ''Access permissions''
The level of access that various user classes should have to this page. * ''Includes''
Shows any resources that you include into this page - not edited directly, but rather via the ImportTiddlers feature. * ''Read-only view options''
Various aspects of how the page looks to someone who does not have edit access. The page properties dialog is normally accessed via the edit menu, but for a page with no data, it opens automatically.
The login dialog is usually accessed via the button at the top of the toolset on the right.
